response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. We understand its worth to both us and you, and we are confident that this offer represents a fair and advantageous transaction for all parties involved. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
